ygData.subject: RE: Digest Number 419
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I haven t noticed stalkers at all.  Guess I m just lucky.  7 of the 9 characters I play regularly are female, and all of those are from the pretty races.
ygData.messageBody:
> OK time for a new wrinkle on the stalker issue, have any of
> you who play female characters noticed a trend in the race of
> the stalkers?

I haven't noticed stalkers at all. Guess I'm just lucky. 7 of the 9
characters I play regularly are female, and all of those are from the
"pretty" races.

> Nothing
> is as startling
> as seeing a balding gnome flying across your vision arms
> outstretched going
> 'Yeauh!'

ROTFLMAO!!!!!!!
Makes me want to start a tenth character just so I can try this! ;^)

Peace
8 Newbies of Tunare
